meta.name: keyword
meta.content: JavaScript Optimizer - JSO - Getting Started - Compress, Optimize JS Files, CSS, IE cache

body.section:
Here is the performances that we obtain by setting the different modes of JavaScript Optimizer - JSO in a basic JSP (demo values computed on Firefox 2.0):
Exploded mode: classic loading mode.
Resource Name Response length (byte)
Request time (ms)
util.js136978
demojs2common.js23494
demojs1common.js238110
AjaxPooler.js2135188
Ajax.js6964188
RIATimer.js1792203
demojs2.js215281
demojs1.js215282
Complete mode: resources are concatenated.
Resource Name Response length (byte) Request time (ms)
demo-full-complete.js13170300
Minimized mode: resources are concatenated and minimized.
Resource Name Response length (byte) Request time (ms)
demo-full-min.js6449250
